Name: Tomato
Description: Tomato is a popular vegetable with various culinary uses.
GeneralUse: Used in salads, sauces, and soups.
Warnings: Allergic reactions possible for some individuals.

Name: Basil
Description: Basil is a fragrant herb used in various cuisines, particularly in Italian dishes.
treatment: Avoid overhead watering, provide good air circulation.
Properties: Aromatic leaves with a sweet flavor.
GeneralUse: Used in pesto, salads, and pasta dishes.
MedicalUse: Traditional medicinal uses for digestive issues and as a natural insect repellent.
Warnings: Ingestion in large quantities may be harmful.

Name: Cucumber
Description: Cucumber is a widely cultivated plant in the gourd family, Cucurbitaceae.
treatment: Provide good air circulation, avoid overhead watering.
Properties: Refreshing and hydrating, low in calories.
GeneralUse: Commonly eaten fresh in salads or pickled.
MedicalUse: Hydrating properties, sometimes used in skincare.
Warnings: Avoid consumption if allergic to cucumbers.

Name: Spinach
Description: Spinach is a leafy green vegetable rich in nutrients and antioxidants.
treatment: Practice crop rotation, avoid overhead watering.
Properties: High in iron, vitamins, and minerals.
GeneralUse: Used in salads, cooked dishes, and smoothies.
MedicalUse: Promotes bone health, boosts immune system.
Warnings: May contain oxalates, which can interfere with mineral absorption.

Name: Pepper (Capsicum)
Description: Pepper, also known as capsicum or bell pepper, is a fruit of the nightshade family Solanaceae.
Properties: Rich in vitamins C and A, low in calories.
GeneralUse: Used raw in salads, cooked in various dishes.
MedicalUse: Contains antioxidants, beneficial for eye health.
Warnings: May cause digestive discomfort in some individuals.
